Tailscale ate my network (and I love it)

stories.text:
Hello all

Just ended up launching this site that I've built this site over the last week. The idea came from the fact that there are tons of blog articles publishing lengthy articles for daily Wordle answers with a lot of unnecessary crap. This site just shows the answers without any of that. Suggestions ans feedback welcome!

Thanks!
